snippet: A construction worker sitting in a van was ambushed by a gunman Monday morning just after the height of the morning rush, the authorities and witnesses said.
abstract: Louis Lamburini, construction foreman seated behind the wheel of a company van, is ambushed by a former co-worker in a brazen daylight shooting just after the height of the morning rush in Midtown Manhattan; Lamburini is expected to make full recovery; gunman, whose identity is not released and whose motives remain opaque, flees scene.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER and J. DAVID GOODMAN

lead_paragraph: A construction worker sitting in a van was ambushed by a gunman Monday morning just after the height of the morning rush, the authorities and witnesses said.

headline.main: Construction Worker Hurt in Daylight Shooting in Midtown
headline.print_headline: Construction Worker Hurt in Daylight Shooting in Midtown
